actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution urging the Government of Greece to extradite Mohammed Rashid to the United States.

summary.text: Condemns the Government of Greece for permitting an alleged Palestinian terrorist, Abdel al-Zomar, to leave Greece and for denying the extradition request of the Government of Italy. Urges the Government of Greece to adhere to the United States-Greek extradition treaty and to extradite Mohammed Rashid to the United States.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution urging the Government of Greece to extradite Mohammed Rashid to the United States.
